mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users ( user_id, user_pw, name, nickname, email ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{userPw}, #{name}, #{nickname}, #{email})
INSERT INTO user_auth ( user_id, auth ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{auth} )
INSERT INTO user_social ( user_id, social_type, access_token ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{socialType}, #{accessToken} )
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET nickname = #{nickname}, name = #{name}, email = #{email}, upd_date = now() WHERE user_id = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT user_social.* FROM user_social, users INNER JOIN users ON users.user_id = user_social.user_id WHERE users.email = #{email}
